full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA DE NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE LAS CUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI PA ZHES, AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, `SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL TU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CIN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DUL MA BZANG @008B GI RKYEN BAR CHOD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
